description: This file defines the 'WishlistScreen', a Flutter widget that displays a wishlist of books in a 2-column grid with a Call To Action. It manages navigation to a product detail page when a book is tapped.

classes.name: WishlistScreen
classes.description: A Flutter stateless widget that displays a wishlist of books in a grid layout with a header.

methods.name: _openProduct
methods.description: Navigates to the product detail page for a given book using named routing.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the wishlist screen, including app bar, header text, and a grid of book cards.
